movie.title: Mother's Little Helpers
movie.description_intro: When Joy Pride, a groovy 70's burn-out on the caboose of the flower power movement, learns she has weeks to live, her estranged children come together to do right by a mother who always did them wrong. Mother's Little Helpers is a funny dysfunctional-family drama, based on true events and inspired by true lies, about how family ties can twist and tear you - and though they may not break you, they might send you to prison. It explores the "OK, Boomer" relationship between the free love generation and those left to clean up the mess.
movie.description_full: When Joy Pride, a groovy 70's burn-out on the caboose of the flower power movement, learns she has weeks to live, her estranged children come together to do right by a mother who always did them wrong. Mother's Little Helpers is a funny dysfunctional-family drama, based on true events and inspired by true lies, about how family ties can twist and tear you - and though they may not break you, they might send you to prison. It explores the "OK, Boomer" relationship between the free love generation and those left to clean up the mess.

movies.title: Dragonfly
movies.summary: Dr. Joe Darrow is a recently widowed doctor. He is grieving due to the death of his pregnant wife in a Red Cross mission in Venezuela. Although being atheist, he began to believe that his dead wife wants to communicate with him, through her young patients in the Pediatrics of a Chicago hospital.

movies.title: Penguin Rescue
movies.summary: Intergalactic space explorers travel to Earth where they meet a penguin and learn all about the Arctic.
movies.description_full: Intergalactic space explorers travel to Earth where they meet a penguin and learn all about the Arctic.
movies.synopsis: Intergalactic space explorers travel to Earth where they meet a penguin and learn all about the Arctic.

movies.title: The Magnificent Seven
movies.summary: Director Antoine Fuqua brings his modern vision to a classic story in The Magnificent Seven. With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money.

movies.title: The Outsider
movies.summary: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.
